| Resource    | List                                                |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| agent:id    | 000,001,002,003,004,005,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |


| Actions           | Resources | Allow   | Deny                                        |
|-------------------|-----------|---------|---------------------------------------------|
| syscollector:read | agent:id  | 002,004 | 000,001,003,005,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |
